title: Defines a one way relationship to another entity.
description: Defines a one way relationship to another entity. It is required to define the reverse relationship on the target entity.

name.title: The name of the relationship. Contains no spaces.
name.description: The name of the relationship, usually in the format EntityRelationshipTargetEntity. Eg "CountryHasCapitalCity".

description.title: A phrase describing the relationship with the target entity.
description.description: A phrase that describes the relationship of the form <entity> <phrase> <targetEntity>. Eg. "has capital" like in <Country> <has capital> <City>

relationship.title: The type/cardinality of the relationship.
relationship.description: The cardinality (type) of relationship with the target entity, e.g. OneOrMany, ZeroOrOne, etc.

entity.title: The target entity that relates to this entity.
entity.description: The name of the target entity that this entity relates to.

refRelationshipName.description: The name of the relationship in the related entity that this relationship refers to.

apiGenerateReferenceEndpoint.title: Define the Entity on this relationship side contains a Reference endpoints to the related Entity.
apiGenerateReferenceEndpoint.description: Default is true, determines whether OData $ref endpoints are generated for this relationship.

apiGenerateRelatedEndpoint.title: Define the Entity on this relationship side contains endpoints to manage the related Entity.
apiGenerateRelatedEndpoint.description: Default is true, determines whether navigation routing endpoints are generated for the related entities, including enabling ODataQueries for related entities.
